Sentence.sentence: The demographics of that group looked quite different from those in the competition round—of the 16 video finalists, 13 were girls and eight were African-American students.

According to Mark Saul, the director of competitions for the Mathematical Association of America, not a single African-American or Hispanic student—and only a handful of girls—has ever made it to the Math Olympiad team in its 50 years of existence.
The legend says that when seven girls were attacked by bears, they took refuge on top of a small rock, and they appealed to the Rock God for help.
The God caused the rock to grow and to lift the girls far above the ground, while its sides were scored by the claws of the angry bears.
Even today, says the legend, the girls can be seen above the towering rock as seven shining stars in the night sky.

entry.def: You can refer to someone's daughter as a girl .
Young women are often referred to as girls. This use could cause offence.

entry.def: Some people refer to a man's girlfriend as his girl.

sentences.cn: 穿粉色衣服好看: 成年女性已不记得曾经对这个颜色的痴迷，然而它在我们年轻女孩的生活中却非常普遍。

sentences.cn: 并不是说粉色本身有什么不好，而是它只是七色彩虹中微小的一部分。虽然从某种程度上来讲它可以烘托少女的特质，但它也会反复强化女孩的身份与其外表的融合。
sentences.en: It is not that pink intrinsically bad, but it is such a tiny slice of the rainbow and, though it may celebrate girlhood in one way, it also repeatedly and firmly fused girls' identity to appearance.

sentences.cn: 环顾四周，我失望地发现，人们对女孩们的生活和兴趣极度缺乏想象力。
sentences.en: Looking around, despaired at the singular lack of imagination about girls' lives and interests.

sentences.cn: 女孩对粉色的青睐看起来似乎是无法避免的，似乎在某种程度上被编码进了她们 的DNA。不过，根据美国研究副教授乔•帕雷提的说法，情况不是这样的。
sentences.en: Girls' attraction to pink may seem unavoidable, somehow encoded in their DNA, but according to Jo Paoletti, an associate professor of American Studies, it is not.

sentences.en: He tried to ingratiate himself with his girl friend.

sentences.cn: 尽管弗雷德其貌不扬,可他有许多女朋友.
sentences.en: Fred has plenty of girl friends , although he is no oil painting.

sentences.cn: 乔的母亲同意让他和女朋友住在一起, 但父亲却反对.
sentences.en: Joe's mother consents to let him live with his girl friend, but his father doesn't.

sentences.cn: 玛尔塔: 佩德罗总是跟女孩子调情,有差不多二十个女朋友.
sentences.en: Marta: Pedro's always flirting with girls and he has about twenty girlfriends.

sentences.cn: 曾几何时, 我一个礼拜内换了三个女朋友.
sentences.en: Not long since, I changed three girl friends in a week.

sentences.cn: 如果杰克是个花花公子的话, 他可能才会背叛他的女朋友.
sentences.en: If Jack was a playboy, he might betray his girl friend.

sentences.cn: 就在我的女朋友离开我的时候, 我突然明白了她的意思.
sentences.en: When my girl friend went away from me, I did a double take.

sentences.cn: 其中一个男孩太大意了,竟使他的女朋友怀了孕.
sentences.en: One of the boys has been careless enough to prang up his girl friend.

sentences.cn: 别再想你的女朋友了.
sentences.en: Try to forget about your girl friend.

sentences.cn: 过去的女朋友, 现在失宠了, 会提出旁证.
sentences.en: Old girls, now rejected, would quote chapter and verse.

sentences.cn: 结果, 他在这个聚会上失去了他的女朋友.
sentences.en: As it turned out, he lost his girl at this party.

sentences.cn: 他正跟他的某个女朋友一起庆祝他找到了第一份工作.
sentences.en: Miguel : He's celebrating his first job with one of his girls.

sentences.cn: 他的女朋友昨天因未被邀请参加舞会而沮丧.
sentences.en: His girl friend was blue about not being invited to the dance party yesterday.

sentences.cn: 他是个花花公子,只对约会新女朋友感兴趣.
sentences.en: He's really a playboy as he is only interested in dating new girls.

sentences.cn: 他十八岁才开始交女朋友.
sentences.en: He was eighteen before he started going out with girls.

sentences.cn: 乔治的女朋友老是说话不算数,他再也无法忍受了: 他们的关系已经完了.
sentences.en: George won't put up with any more broken promises from his girl friend: they're through.

sentences.cn: 他女朋友是崩龙族人.
sentences.en: His girl friend is of the Benglong ethnic minority.

sentences.cn: 这是为女朋友买的 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is this for your girl friend?

sentences.cn: 迈克为他这个女朋友得意着呢.
sentences.en: Mike was pretty excited about his girl friend.

sentences.cn: 他一面赶路,一面却一个劲地默默祈祷,希望能弄到她的一位性感的姑姑, 或是一位性感的女朋友.
sentences.en: He prayed intensely for her luscious aunt as he ran, or for a luscious girl friend.

sentences.cn: 詹妮斯是他女朋友的名字.
sentences.en: Janice is his girl friend's name.

sentences.cn: 当女朋友称他为心肝宝贝时,这年轻人满脸通红.
sentences.en: The young man blushed when his girl friend called him her sweetie pie.

sentences.cn: 我女朋友是拉拉队长.
sentences.en: My girl friend is a cheer leader.

sentences.cn: 可以, 不过我可以带我女朋友来 吗 ?
sentences.en: Of course. But do you mind if I bring my girl friend?

sentences.cn: 乔很伤心,因为他的女朋友不要他了.
sentences.en: Joe is sad because he just got the gate from his girl.

sentences.cn: “他现在有女朋友了，他们住在一起。”——“他可真行啊。”
sentences.en: "He has a girl now, who he lives with." — "Good for him."
